page.title: 12BROADFORD GARAGE
page.content: {Sutherland's Garage and filling {station}was opened in 1925.The garage is presently a Volkswagen Agency,their best selling car being the Volkswagen Polo.The garage sells new Volkswagens, Audis and also second-hand cars. The most cars that can be worked on at any one time in the garage is fifteen. There is eighteen of a staff working in the garage at any one time. The garage has facilities for servicing, panel beating,sales and maintenance. It is spread over two sites with petrol pumps and{undertaking}in the old Campbell's Garage and all other services in the main building, 100yds further along the road.Sutherland's has the only petrol/diesel sales outlet in Broadford. There is three clerical staff and this year,the accounts were computerised.
